function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased exposure to contagious diseases due to working with larger crowds and handling returned items.","Impact":"Potential illness or infection among retail employees, leading to absenteeism and decreased workforce.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, provide personal protective equipment, and enforce social distancing measures in the store.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, temperature scanners, and air purifiers.","People":"Frontline retail employees","Owner":"Retail management and human resources team"},{"Description":"Verbal abuse and threats from frustrated customers due to new safety measures and restrictions.","Impact":"Psychological stress, trauma, and emotional harm to retail employees, leading to decreased morale and job satisfaction.","Mitigation":"Provide customer service training, establish zero-tolerance policies for abusive behavior, and offer mental health support for employees.","Technologies":"Security cameras, panic buttons, and communication devices for immediate assistance.","People":"Frontline retail employees, management, and customers","Owner":"Retail management and human resources team"},{"Description":"Perception of low social status and lack of glamour in retail work, exacerbated by pandemic-related challenges.","Impact":"Decreased retention, recruitment difficulties, and negative impact on industry reputation.","Mitigation":"Promote the value of retail work, offer career development opportunities, and enhance job benefits and rewards.","Technologies":"Employee engagement tools, feedback systems, and training resources.","People":"Retail employees, potential job seekers, and industry stakeholders","Owner":"Retail management and industry organizations"}]}
